entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
